languages.text: "Возможно, кто-то из собравшихся здесь поддержит нас. Люди Риззы, фанатики Иеронимуса... Да хоть завсегдатаи Октавианы. Пригодится каждый. Если захотите укрепить наши позиции перед атакой или оставить "сюрпризы" для гостей — мои люди и арсенал к вашим услугам, просто отдайте указание. Как только мы будем готовы, отправьте Чорда сообщение, что я здесь. Пусть приходит — решим наш спор так, как это принято на Футфоле. Перестрелкой".

"Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, кто-то из собравшихся здесь поддержит нас. Люди Риззы, фанатики Иеронимуса... Да хоть завсегдатаи Октавианы. Пригодится каждый. Если захотите укрепить наши позиции перед атакой или оставить "сюрпризы" для гостей — мои люди и арсенал к вашим услугам, просто отдайте указание. Как только мы будем готовы, отправьте Чорда сообщение, что я здесь. Пусть приходит — решим наш спор так, как это принято на Футфоле. Перестрелкой".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... Hell, even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whoever we can get. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “说不定烈酒修会的人会支持我们，比如莱萨的手下、希罗尼穆斯的狂热分子……奥克塔维娜的常客说不定也会帮忙。我们需要一切能找到的人手。如果您认为应该强化我们的阵地，或者为我们的客人准备些意外之喜，我的手下和我的军火库都任由您差遣，只要您发话就好。等我们准备好之后，您就可以通知库尔达，说我人已经在酒吧里了。等她过来之后，我们就用落脚港惯用的方式解决分歧——用子弹。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."

traits.locale_text: “说不定烈酒修会的人会支持我们，比如莱萨的手下、希罗尼穆斯的狂热分子……奥克塔维娜的常客说不定也会帮忙。我们需要一切能找到的人手。如果您认为应该强化我们的阵地，或者为我们的客人准备些意外之喜，我的手下和我的军火库都任由您差遣，只要您发话就好。等我们准备好之后，您就可以通知库尔达，说我人已经在酒吧里了。等她过来之后，我们就用落脚港惯用的方式解决分歧——用子弹。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「おそらくここに集まっている者の中には、私たちを支持してくれる人もいるだろう。リザの仲間、ヒエロニムスの狂信者たち…オクタヴィアナの常連たちもそうだ。誰を使ってもいい。それが私達のいる場所をより強固にするものや、お客人のためのサプライズの準備になると思ったならば、私の仲間や武器庫を自由に使って構わない。準備ができ次第、チョーダに私がここにいるとメッセージを送ってくれ。ここに来させるんだ。フットフォールのやり方で決着をつけよう。そう、銃撃戦でな」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらくここに集まっている者の中には、私たちを支持してくれる人もいるだろう。リザの仲間、ヒエロニムスの狂信者たち…オクタヴィアナの常連たちもそうだ。誰を使ってもいい。それが私達のいる場所をより強固にするものや、お客人のためのサプライズの準備になると思ったならば、私の仲間や武器庫を自由に使って構わない。準備ができ次第、チョーダに私がここにいるとメッセージを送ってくれ。ここに来させるんだ。フットフォールのやり方で決着をつけよう。そう、銃撃戦でな」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Tal vez algunos de los aquí reunidos nos ayuden. La gente de Ryzza, los fanáticos de Hieronymus... hasta los clientes de Octaviana. Necesitaremos toda la ayuda posible. Si cree que merece la pena reforzar nuestras posiciones o preparar algunas sorpresas para las visitas, mi gente y mi arsenal están a su disposición. Solo tiene que dar la orden. En cuanto todo esté listo, informe a Chorda de que estoy aquí. Que venga y resolveremos esto a la manera de Paso: con un buen tiroteo».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez algunos de los aquí reunidos nos ayuden. La gente de Ryzza, los fanáticos de Hieronymus... hasta los clientes de Octaviana. Necesitaremos toda la ayuda posible. Si cree que merece la pena reforzar nuestras posiciones o preparar algunas sorpresas para las visitas, mi gente y mi arsenal están a su disposición. Solo tiene que dar la orden. En cuanto todo esté listo, informe a Chorda de que estoy aquí. Que venga y resolveremos esto a la manera de Paso: con un buen tiroteo».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Vielleicht unterstützen uns auch einige von denen, die hier versammelt sind. Ryzzas Leute, die Fanatiker von Hieronymus ... selbst Octavianas Stammgäste. Wir können jeden brauchen, den wir kriegen können. Falls Ihr denkt, es könnte sich lohnen, unsere Positionen zu verstärken oder einige Überraschungen für unsere Gäste vorzubereiten, stehen Euch meine Leute und unser Arsenal zur Verfügung ... Ihr müsst nur darum bitten. Sobald wir bereit sind, schickt Chorda eine Nachricht, dass ich hier bin. Lasst sie kommen. Wir klären unsere Differenzen auf Footfall-Art. Mit einer Schießerei."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht unterstützen uns auch einige von denen, die hier versammelt sind. Ryzzas Piraten, Hieronymus' Fanatiker ... Scheiße, sogar Octavianas Stammgäste. Wir können jeden brauchen, den wir kriegen können. Sobald wir bereit sind, schickt Chorda eine Nachricht, dass ich hier bin. Lasst sie kommen. Wir klären unsere Differenzen, wie man das auf Footfall eben macht. Mit einer Schießerei."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Il est possible que certains des individus présents dans la station nous soutiennent : les hommes de Ryzza, les fanatiques de Hiéronymus... peut-être même les piliers de bar d'Octaviana. Nous aurons besoin de tous ceux que nous pourrons rallier à notre cause. Si vous pensez qu'il peut valoir le coup de renforcer nos positions ou de préparer quelques surprises pour nos invités, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire : mes hommes et mon arsenal sont à votre disposition. Dès que nous serons prêts, envoyez un message à Chorda lui disant que je suis là et laissez-la venir. Alors, nous réglerons nos comptes à la mode de Castel : en laissant parler nos armes. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."

traits.locale_text: « Il est possible que certains des individus présents dans la station nous soutiennent : les hommes de Ryzza, les fanatiques de Hiéronymus... peut-être même les piliers de bar d'Octaviana. Nous aurons besoin de tous ceux que nous pourrons rallier à notre cause. Si vous pensez qu'il peut valoir le coup de renforcer nos positions ou de préparer quelques surprises pour nos invités, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire : mes hommes et mon arsenal sont à votre disposition. Dès que nous serons prêts, envoyez un message à Chorda lui disant que je suis là et laissez-la venir. Alors, nous réglerons nos comptes à la mode de Castel : en laissant parler nos armes. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Belki burada toplananlardan bazıları bize destek çıkar. Ryzza'nın adamları, Hieronymus'un bağnazları... Octaviana'nın müşterileri bile olabilir. Artık kimi bulabilirsek. Mevkimizi tahkim etmeyi yahut konuklarımıza birkaç sürpriz hazırlamayı düşünürseniz adamlarım ve cephaneliğim hizmetinizdedir, söylemeniz yeterli. Hazır olur olmaz Chorda'ya burada olduğumu bildiren bir mesaj gönderin. Gelsin bakalım. Aramızdaki anlaşmazlığı Binliman usulü çözelim. Yani çatışarak."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps some of those gathered in here will support us. Ryzza's people, Hieronymus's zealots... even Octaviana's regulars. We can use whomever we can get. If you think that it may be worth fortifying our positions or preparing a few surprises for our guests, my people and arsenal are at your disposal — all you have to do is say the word. As soon as we're ready, send Chorda a message saying I'm here. Let her come. We'll settle our differences the Footfall way. With a gunfight."
